subject: Football (College)
Sports Injuries
Insurance
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Disability Insurance
lead_paragraph: Loss-of-value insurance, intended to protect athletes who may become injured and miss out on money they would have received from professional contracts, is not as helpful as it may seem, critics say.
snippet: Loss-of-value insurance, intended to protect athletes who may become injured and miss out on money they would have received from professional contracts, is not as helpful as it may seem, critics say.
